adjective.description: Denoting an animal, especially a horse or cow, having a coat of a main color thickly interspersed with hairs of another color, typically bay, chestnut, or black mixed with white.

noun.description: An animal with a roan coat.
examples: the roan on the right is a stallion

origin: Early 19th century: perhaps from Roan, the old name of the French town of Rouen.
